summary: Provides configurable convolutional building blocks for MONAI networks, combining convolution or transposed convolution with optional normalization, dropout, activation, and residual connections, and supporting arbitrary spatial dimensions, stride, dilation, groups, bias, and padding options.
business_intent: Facilitate the creation of flexible and reusable convolutional layers for medical imaging deep learning models, streamlining model development and ensuring consistency across MONAI architectures.
